summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingGive BackKiehl's Ultra Facial Barrier Hydrating Cleanser is a cream-to-foam facial cleanser that removes makeup and sunscreen without stripping skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsA hydrating cream-to-foam cleanser for sensitive skin that lifts impurities without stripping the skin barrier.Research ResultsClinically tested to help remove makeup and sunscreen while immediately hydrating the skin.Formulated WithoutFormulated with no soap and no fragrance for all skin types including sensitive skin.Item 2638429How To UseLather formula with water to create creamy foam texture. Massage over face in circular motion. Rinse thoroughly and remove excess with a damp wash cloth or water. Gentle enough to use 2x a day.IngredientsAqua / Water / Eau, Glycerin, Sodium Cocoyl Glycinate, Sodium Chloride, Glycol Distearate, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Citric Acid, Glyceryl Stearate, Peg-100 Stearate, Phenoxyethanol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Kaolin, Hydroxypropyl Starch Phosphate, Caprylyl Glycol, Acrylates Copolymer, Behenyl Alcohol, Magnesium Gluconate, Squalane, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Panthenol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Lather formula with water to create creamy foam texture. Massage over face in circular motion. Rinse thoroughly and remove excess with a damp wash cloth or water. Gentle enough to use 2x a day.

reviews.headline: Gentle and effective!
reviews.comments:
I'm always skeptical about getting a newer skincare product because I have super sensitive and dry, but acne prone skin. 

But, this one really caught my eyeâ€” and I'm SO GLAD I bought it! 

It's so gentle, but it's thick and creamy and foams up more than I thought it would. 

I live in an arid climate so my dry skin is double dry and this face wash doesnt leave it feeling stripped. In my opinion, it's worth it!
